X509CertificateCollection

X509CertificateCollection
MozillaRootCertificates

X509CertificateCollection

A class to store and index X509 Certificates by Subject.  Copyright © 2007 Henri Torgemane

See LICENSE.txt for full license information.

Variables
_map
Functions
X509CertificateCollection
addPEMCertificateMostly meant for built-in CA loading.
addCertificateAdds a X509 certificate to the collection.
getCertificateReturns a X509 Certificate present in the collection, given a base64 DER encoded X500 Subject principal

Variables

_map

private var _map: Object

Functions

X509CertificateCollection

public function X509CertificateCollection()

addPEMCertificate

public function addPEMCertificate(name: String,
subject: String,
pem: String):void

Mostly meant for built-in CA loading.  This entry-point allows to index CAs without parsing them.

Parameters

nameA friendly name. not currently used
subjectbase64 DER encoded Subject principal for the Cert
pemPEM encoded certificate data

addCertificate

public function addCertificate(cert: X509Certificate):void

Adds a X509 certificate to the collection.  This call will force the certificate to be parsed.

Parameters

certA X509 certificate

getCertificate

public function getCertificate(subject: String):X509Certificate

Returns a X509 Certificate present in the collection, given a base64 DER encoded X500 Subject principal

Parameters

subjectA Base64 DER-encoded Subject principal

Returns

A matching certificate, or null.
